description.text: At 10th level, the serpent-fire adept gains Chakra Master as a bonus feat. She need not meet the feat's prerequisites. When maintaining her open chakras with chakra expertise, she can spend 1 point of ki to gain the benefits of two chakras rather than one in that round (or three chakras, if she has opened her crown chakra). At 14th level, the serpent-fire adept's pool of serpent-fire ki increases to 7 points, and at 18th level, it increases to 9 points.
